opinion:
STATE v. WHITEHOUSE, 60 Conn. App. 909 (2000) 761 A.2d 801 STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. GEORGE WHITEHOUSE (AC 19470)Appellate Court of Connecticut
Foti, Spear and Pellegrino, Js.
Argued October 16
Officially released November 7, 2000
Defendant's appeal from the Superior Court in the judicial district of Hartford, geographical area number twelve, D'Addabbo, J.
Per Curiam.
The judgment is affirmed.
